website_summaries.verdict: Features natural ingredients that will leave your hair feeling soft after you wash it out.
pros: More expensive than some others, but it’s a large capacity jar, so the price per ounce is reasonable
Very easy to use and to remove
This pomade formula recently underwent a change to improve performance
Provides benefits to the scalp, including skin repair and hair growth stimulation
cons: Creates hair that’s too stiff for the liking of some users

customer_reviews.title: Just found my new hair product!
customer_reviews.text: I came across Jovinno from an Ad I came across on Instagram. I've been looking for a natural pomade and decided to give it a shot, and it's defiantly what I've been looking for I like a lot of volume on my hair, and it gave me that volume I like. The metal hairstyling comb was a plus its unique wide tooth gives you a natural texture without the need of running your fingers through. Love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for defining curls without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: First off, this product is so pretty! The package is sleek, the pomade itself is black (which threw me off at first but it goes on clear when you put it on the hair), and it smells amazing. More important, the quality of the product is on point. I use it when my hair is slightly damp from the shower by rubbing a small amount in my palms and lightly scrunching my curls. It helps to give the curls shape without the frizz or crunchiness. A little bit of this goes a long way too, so I'm going to let my brother try it out also. Would definitely get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Natural goodness
customer_reviews.text: As far as natural pomades go, it has been the best performer I've experienced thus far. Very good ingredients, excellent packaging, and smells very nice. Thicker hair types like myself do require a bit extra product and possibly a touch of hairspray for the humid days.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Safe On Kids
customer_reviews.text: I finally get to style my 3 year old sons hair thanks to Jovinno. This pomade is safe on kids even for those losing hair like myself. I was hoping target carried this pomade but unfortunately they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great pomade! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Right off the bat you can tell the container of the pomade is really nice! Makes you feel like you spent 24 dollars for pomade. But I love the pomade I used to use Axes line of pomade but realized it had castor oil which is bad for your hair and wanted to go the organic route. So I picked this pomade and boy does it feel and smell great on your hair! And its really easy to wash out of your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Lakilak

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Upon arrival, canister appeared to have been slightly used as a hockey puck prior to shipping. Actual 'pomade' is much more like a 90s era gel. Hold is only OK. Leaves hair feeling quite sticky, there's definitely residue. Kind of a brittle feeling closer to uncooked spaghetti. Maybe that's desirable for some, but it you want your hair feeling softer when you run your hands through it, I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Holds down the curls!
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair and I have been growing it out recently and no matter what I tried I would always get a curl flip in the back. I hated it. I have tried Pomades like Layrite, Suavecito, and Reuzel and this one holds down my curls by far the best. Im not a huge fan of the smell but its not strong so I dont really care. Its a little pricey but it works so well I will definitely continue to buy. To top it off its all natural which is the reason I gave it a shot in the first place! It was just an added bonus that it happened to work the best too.
customer_reviews.author: Hockey19

customer_reviews.title: The only product I use
customer_reviews.text: I wish this were sold at local stores so I could easily purchase it but nonetheless, I’ve reordered this product from amazon countless times already. Smells like watermelon when applying it which I like. Clean ingredients which make me feel comfortable applying this to my hair. Gives my hair that wet look I like but keeps my hair in place without making my hair rock hard like a gel would.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and it was mostly men but it’s nice to get a woman’s point of view too. It leaves my hair full of body and has a medium hold while it also keeps my hair soft. My hair is short and I prefer the messy look, leaves my hair matte and not shiny which I also prefer.
customer_reviews.author: rco

customer_reviews.title: Jovinno is the Best!!
customer_reviews.text: Best pomade made by ANY company. I have thick hair and tried different pomade and hair wax products and none has provided me the style, hold, and shine like Jovinno! I'm active everyday training and my hair stays in place under varying temperatures. It easily rinses out at night and doesn't leave any residue after being in my hair all day considering it's make with all natural ingredients. This is by far the pomade or hair wax in the retail market. I've tried many products and none compares with Jovinno!
customer_reviews.author: Veed

customer_reviews.title: BEST POMADE
customer_reviews.text: Best pomade iv used and it's all natural ! What more can we ask for this product is amazing , use a little for lite hold or use a lot for a strong hold like gel. Smell is great ver clean light scent that goes away with time ver long lasting and easy to wash out
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Hair Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Personally I am not a huge fan. I have thick super-straight hair and it doesn't work very well (I guess I haven't found a product that works super well yet, though) but it also makes my hair very sticky. My hair is collecting dust all the time when I use this. I thought it would be a good natural substitute for a similar product, but also there is "fragrance" which could be a number of things. The smell is also like fruit candy or skittles.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff Chang

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for hair, firm hold, shine, I also use it on my beard.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. It holds firm so in the wind it doesn't lose it places yet you can readjust it if you wish. I also use some of it on my bread to give it a little shine. There were many products on Amazon that might have had more reviews but nearly all had the same complaint, that it as greasy looking. I don't want to go to work like I have coconut oil in my head. This truly is a great product from the ingredients that are in it to the way it makes your hair hold up and also quantity. It's a nice size glass tub of Pomade.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Best Pomade Around
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Pomade on the market. A little goes a long way. Rinses out with water easily. Perfect if you only wash your hair with shampoo a couple times a week. Am a lifetime consumer. Buy with confidence 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Unique Finds

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: This wax is a great buy for who ever is looking to give a lil bump to hair and keep them there. Both in short and long hairs, this product holds my hair in great position and its not as messy as a regular gel, super easy to clean and smells nice. I have been looking to get a product that works on my hair but doesnt have chemicals, this is what i found and i am glad i did. absolutely great.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Rana

customer_reviews.title: Jovinno Pomade. Great product but has chance their quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I has ordered before (august 2019) and now (november 2019). Before this product was perfect, now the quality, the texture is not the same, le odor, before was more thick and duty than now. The container has change and the description too. I don't know what happened with Jovinno. I feel desapointed right now!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Santana

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product
customer_reviews.text: Strong hold and great smell. I really like how it’s easy to wash out of your hair too. The only downside is that it’s pricey but you’re paying for a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell and look.
customer_reviews.text: Real good hold and smells amazing. When I want a flare look I just apply a little more and my hair stays ready for the day
customer_reviews.author: Roberto M Camacho

customer_reviews.title: This pomade is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My go to pomade has always been Suavecito or Layrite but I was never really satisfied with them. I had issues such as hair starting to curl after about 4 hours of use, acne, itchy scalp and even pomade running down my forehead and irritating my eyes. With Jovinno Pomade I haven't had any of those issues. It washes right out with just water, and it holds my hair exactly the way I style it. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: ALLDAY

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst pomade I have used.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why there are so many good reviews. This stuff is like glue. Hard to put on the hair. Heavy and stiff on the hair. Hard to comb through. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Park

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the one
customer_reviews.text: Returning customer, love this pomade. Not the strongest hold for my thick wavy hair but that’s not it’s intention. Such a classy looking, slick hold and I top it off with some hair spray to maintain it. Tried so many pomades and this is it folks.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F.

customer_reviews.title: amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: all organic ingredients, mostly plant based, like fruit items. Smells like watermelon. Full day hold, a little shiny. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SSS Macn

customer_reviews.title: Great, but make a scent for MEN.
customer_reviews.text: Super strong hold, arguably the best hold I’ve seen in a pomade. Only complaint is that it smells like a woman’s fruity body spray.
customer_reviews.author: Lucian

customer_reviews.title: Great Pomade Cool Hair Comb
customer_reviews.text: Now I know what all the hype is about. Decided to shift from gels to pomades, a few friends of mine use this stuff and recommended I try Jovinno out so I did I also decided to try out their new metal hair and beard comb. This stuff is incredible it's not oily or too thick on the hair, love the matte finish the comb styles my hair pretty nice which is a plus. Great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good, Firm Hold.
customer_reviews.text: The product has a great scent, helped easily style my hair, and had a firm hold even while applying. The only reason I took a star off was because the wax was pretty stiff while applying which made it a tad difficult to work with, however that may not be a con to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Best hair gel that withstands rain, sweat, and the beach
customer_reviews.text: The hair gel came in fancy packaging, which was a nice touch. The gel works great for molding. Went to the beach with the gel on and it withstood salt water, sweat, and sand and still held up perfectly. Great product, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh J.

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but worth every dollar.... Guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pomade/gel/wax whatever you want to call it period!. Its all natural and it smells great. i have ever tried several ones all my life and trust me nothing compares to this one. Its a little pricey but it is worth every dollar plus you literaly just need a small amount everyday so it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: EAPTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more
customer_reviews.text: The first hair product I have found to be able to tame my long hair (after trying many, including American Crew, and Aveda). Smells great. Gives a good volume. Lasts all day. General amount. Easy to wash. Couldn't ask for more, really.
customer_reviews.author: P. The Reasonable

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this pomade! Nice high end product with natural ingredients the smell is just amazing. We both use the Jovinno hair treatment serum as well which promotes hair and beard growth. Great products!
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE

customer_reviews.title: Nice nice nice
customer_reviews.text: it has a good hold when is dry, and u dont have to use a lot of product. Is really good expecially because it has good ingredients, is soft on the hair it doest make it feel plastic and it hold it suprinzingly well :d
customer_reviews.author: radu

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This "premium" pomade is pretty much re packaged 99 cent store hair gel. It feels and smells the same. It does get the job done but I dont think its worth the price. If you get axe pomade youd probably get the same results. One good thing is that it does wash out easier. but overall meh
customer_reviews.author: noodles

customer_reviews.title: Love it great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product smells like a jolly rancher candy great hold great shine easy to apply easy to wash off really a great product and being all natural a plus plus really love this product great size for the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Manageable and feels/looks natural
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Great for thick hair, natural look and hair feels like there isnt product in it. Ive got to wear a hardhat from time to time and wear over the head noise canceling head phones often. Afterwards move hand through hair and removes all signs of compression.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the scent and odor are good, doesn't seem to have any side effects to the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Yonghua Qin

customer_reviews.title: Must try this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my boyfriend and he loves it! He's tried several different products but everything either left a funky residue or was overly hard when it dried! But this works perfectly w very little amount of product! It was recommended by a friend of mine and he is in the fashion industry and highly recommends it to a lot of people! Washes out easily which is a plus!!! And it smells good too!! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best pomade so far!
customer_reviews.text: This product is by far, the best I have tried for my husbands hair. And believe me when I say we have tried A LOT of them, both organic/natural pomades... This keeps his hair in place for the updo he does, for he has thick hair. He mentioned its super easy to wash out unlike other ones and the huge bonus is that it's doesn't contain harsh cemicals, dyes.. ect.. that strips your hair either!! FIVE STARS all way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Light finish but a strong hold without too much of a crunchy feeling. Has a leave in conditioner affect too
customer_reviews.author: Drew Way

customer_reviews.title: Jovinno is one of the best hair-wax products in the market right now
customer_reviews.text: Jovinno is one of the best hair-wax products in the market right now. This product works on mostly any type of hair - just remember it is meant to be applied when the hair is damp. The pomade is very malleable however it stays strong once applied. It would mold your hair in almost any shape that you would like. Made of natural ingredients; the pomade washes away from hands and hair with a lot of ease: it isn't either too sticky or greasy. In the 1st appliance you will feel the excellent quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Chung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I slick my hair back, defiently works well, all natural, smells good
customer_reviews.author: jake goldie

customer_reviews.title: looks like it will last for a while
customer_reviews.text: works well on my hair which is curly and somewhat short. looks like it will last for a while, which is good!
customer_reviews.author: K. Singh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash and apply. All natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is easy to style on wet hair and does not leave a wax-like residue. It's also very easy to wash and it has a sweet smell to it. Jovinno is all natural and has no harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Product is decent, gave issues
customer_reviews.text: Gave me terrible dandruff fast. Product itself is good, medium hold.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Verdict isn't in.
customer_reviews.text: Still trying. The votes still out if it's worth the money but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has always used a more toxic formula to style his hair. After trying this, he won’t go back! Works exactly like the name brand that has been around forever.
customer_reviews.author: Bri G

customer_reviews.title: Clean and not overpowering scent or hold
customer_reviews.text: Clean fragrance that fades quickly. Good luster but not oily slick. Right amount of hold
customer_reviews.author: King Cheetah

customer_reviews.title: A repeat customer now
customer_reviews.text: My go to item now, strong hold that gives my short hair volume with easy application so your not grabbing a bunch of product to get the effect you want. This one container lasted me about 3-4 months of daily use and is my 2nd time buying the product again. Highly recommend for those who are looking for good quality without spending $40+ dollars
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Jovino is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Jovino is such a great product, its all natural with no chemicals, has truly made my hair grow in areas where my hair was receding, makes hair be fuller & healthier, jovino is honestly the way to go, like the smell & texture as well, defiantly a must have year round
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I will buy this product again and again
customer_reviews.author: Hussein

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great, Propylene glycol is not natural.
customer_reviews.text: I must have missed that ingredient when I was reading them online. I'm super disappointed to see it on the list. That being said the product works fantastic for edges, is just shiny enough, not to shiny, has a long hold. I have very curly hair and am African American and i use this for my edges. After I'm done with this product I won't reorder it because I personally don't like that ingredient but this product is much more natural than others on the market. You have to weigh your options. Also, this product is huge, twice to three times the size of others.
customer_reviews.author: Healing Cave Lady

customer_reviews.title: Im happy to see this product on amazon
customer_reviews.text: About 5 years ago, I started using this product, and I was impressed. I've never been more impressed by a hair product, that it left me wondering once I was done using it, is where can I get this product consistently. Im happy to see this product on amazon. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HANDS DOWN THE BEST POMADE ON THE MARKET IN EVER REGARD!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best quality pomades out on the market... Love the texture, non greasy, and it smells fantastic. Best part is it washes out easily and makes my hair feel healthier after ever use. I have a full set of hair but thin hair, and it gives me volume with great hold; without weighing my hair down. Ive been using gels and pomades for the past 16 years and I can say by far this is the best I've used!!! Well done JAVINNO, well done!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Shaker

customer_reviews.title: Sticky but still not to hard
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Mixes well and keeps the hair in place without making it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Starting loosing my hair because of bad products. This natural product is helping so much ...
customer_reviews.text: Starting loosing my hair because of bad products. This natural product is helping so much along with a Pura D'or organic shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: it is easy smooth and not oily
customer_reviews.text: just got mine, it is easy smooth and not oily. I have used it twice so far and I like how it hold my hair. if ELVIS PRESLEY was alive he would have use this product. good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well with hair
customer_reviews.text: Everyone has different hair types and this is My go to product! Expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: but works great once you master it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an all natural solution to hair paste and I found it. It is a little different to use, but works great once you master it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hair jelly!
customer_reviews.text: This is stuff is great. It's all natural and doesnt irritate my scalp. It holds well hand looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Chester Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product for men and women
customer_reviews.text: Must say, this is definitely one of he best pomades I have ever used. Goes into hair nice and smooth and washes out extremely easy. Holds hair firmly and let's you style any type of hair. Good for both men and women.
customer_reviews.author: 1Influence

customer_reviews.title: This smelled like grape juice and made me feel fresh whenever I ...
customer_reviews.text: This smelled like grape juice and made me feel fresh whenever I smelled it. Only thing is that it was very easily changed by water. Which is not really a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo piedrasanta

customer_reviews.title: Worth the value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and one of the best products I used in a while! I have very straight hair but this product fits right for me. This product just defines quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kazi

customer_reviews.title: High Praise In Few Words
customer_reviews.text: Jovinno is simply the BEST men's hair styling product on the market...period
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buffalo

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great strong hold product! I usually use suavecito but this holds better
customer_reviews.author: veronica gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Sometimes I need more products so that my hair stays in shape.
customer_reviews.author: samforchew

customer_reviews.title: good peakage
customer_reviews.text: i like it very cute style. easy to use highly recommend to my bros. good peakage
customer_reviews.author: Noah Stopek

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: Great pomade. Washes clean and smells pretty good. Price is high. I wish they sold it in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would say American Crew has slightly better hold but dries your hair out
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this product. Has a watermelon-esque scent to it but it's a very light smell. The hold is decent but I bought it mainly because it uses a lot of natural ingredients. I figured if I'm going to have something in my hair all day might as well use a product that's natural. I would say American Crew has slightly better hold but dries your hair out. Jovinno does not.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Found my dream hair product
customer_reviews.text: Does not dry my scalp and cause irritation like the others do. Finally!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bungee

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product and its results. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Naguero4ever

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best hair product I have ever used. Everyone noticed it and gave me compliments on how shiny and full my hair looked. I ordered another one for my boyfriend because he liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Best pomade in the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product!! 100% recommend it to anyone who is looking for a pomade that has a nice hold/shine and its very easy to take off with water.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Molina

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best pomade ever. I’m actually on my second or third option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I needed something all natural and tried this one. I was not disappointed. A great hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suitable All Natural Redken Maneuver Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rocks! Much better than Redken Maneuver because it's all natural! I think it might even last longer too. It's definitely better with water resistance (like a rainy day).
customer_reviews.author: Party of Five

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but good pomade. Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: This pomade has a good hold, similar to that of other water soluble pomades on the market. The smell is nice, reminds me of water melon. Even the container it came in was nicer than typical plastic containers other pomades come in. Water soluble so easy to wash out. Probably the only downside to this pomade is the price. It is almost twice as much as some others. However, it is 5 oz vs the typical 4 oz containers so you get a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff. It's expensive but the best wax I've ever bought. Love the fragrance too.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best natural pomade I've ever used. Can't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Perez

customer_reviews.title: Holds well. Not the easiest to apply, spread ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds well. Not the easiest to apply, spread it well over ur hands so u don't end up with a clump in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good though pricey!
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is cost---its pricier than anything else that I've used and its natural, but it does work well. For reference, I used to use Scwartzkopf Spikers Glue for my hair---not for any crazy hairdo but for my long,straight,rigid Asian hair that does like to style well with the softer/weaker type gels. This pomade does the job, without making my hair super hard and also has the added benefit of permitting restyling if needed. Smelling nice is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: wahooiee

customer_reviews.title: Best Pomade I tried
customer_reviews.text: Best Pomade I tried so far, they should really put their other products here as well. I'm so hyped. And I've been using this product for almost 3 weeks now. Not a single complain. I usually use American Crew pomade, but this guy just killed it.
customer_reviews.author: JET

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this because of the good reviews it had and it is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of the good reviews it had and it is a great product. It smells good and has a strong hold.
customer_reviews.author: Myreview

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves hair feeling natural after use. No smells or greases. Quality product. I'll be buying more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews but this is an awesome product, Its makes fixing my hair a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this is an awesome product, Its makes fixing my hair a breeze. Hold and texture is great. I Will be buying again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Maqusi

customer_reviews.title: leaves hair very stiff
customer_reviews.text: It smells good, it is not a traditional pomade I would say. It does leave the hair stiff, I was looking for something to leave it more smooth. Overall it is ok but not exactly what I want. If you are looking to have your hair stiff and hold solid then perfect if you want it to have some smoothness to it then probably not for you.
customer_reviews.author: jbatman

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: High quality natural product, water soluble/non-greasy, very light pleasant scent, thins out into damp hair or wet hands to apply, and works perfectly for me. If you like to apply your pomade while your hair is damp and prefer something that will not stiffen up too much, I recommend this product. Depending on the amount applied, I can get a medium hold on a clean combed look, or use a little less and the pomade acts almost like a leave-in conditioner for a more relaxed style if your hair has some length. I'm on my second 5 oz. jar and the first one lasted 7 months. Made in France and worth the premium price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Product
customer_reviews.text: This is by the best hair product I've ever used. It feels clean and light but it holds perfectly. I can wash it out easily with water and it doesn't make my hair fall out like other gels, waxes or pomades I've used before. It works well with short hair and even now that my hair is longer it still does the job just the way I want it to. It even smells great! I dont think there is any other hair product for men like this on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ramin H

customer_reviews.title: a good organic product
customer_reviews.text: Lools to be.a good organic product, but just doesn't easily work into my hair. I find it too gelatinous, it's more like a very firm gel than a pomade. I won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Zerbe

customer_reviews.title: But smells great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think it would be so thick . But smells great
customer_reviews.author: STEVE

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not really because it didn't hold my hair and didn't really have shine
customer_reviews.author: elias

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, product sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, product sucks. I don't trust Amazon reviews anymore.
customer_reviews.author: King Charles III

customer_reviews.title: contains PROPYLENE GLYCOL AKA MINERAL OIL!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Contains PROPYLENE GLYCOL. That's also called Mineral Oil: a by product of gasoline production. Linked to cancer and considered TOXIC. Thanks but no thanks. To be fair I purchased this twice while falling for the terminology of "All Natural" labeling until I took a closer look at the ingredients. It does have a nice hold. But BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: A.Rabine

customer_reviews.title: Hair Pomade with good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my go-to hair styling products. It's made in France and has all natural ingredients. I can use this product with confidence knowing that I'm not putting dangerous chemicals on my head. I only wish it was a little cheaper but it's worth it do not put that other garbage on your head making you go bald and whatever else it does.
customer_reviews.author: Couros Vade

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's a firmer pomade, dries stiffly. Looks great the moment you put it on but dries hard. At first I didn't like it but I started combining it with my American Crew Pomade and it works wonderfully. I get the texture of American Crew with the hold of Jovinno. I also really enjoy the smell of it.
customer_reviews.author: Usuk

customer_reviews.title: My go to pomade
customer_reviews.text: This pomade is the only one ive ever bought twice. I have thick asian hair so its hard for me to style my hair. this pomade has a strong hold and if you style it with wet hair, you can get a bit of a shiny look. The scent and the consistency of this pomade is what seperates this pomade and others. The scent is noticeable but once its in your hair, you wont smell it as strong as other pomades, such as Haircraft, sauvacito, mountain men, layrite. the consistency is like jello? but easily spreadable throughout your hands. It has a "bounce" type of feeling to it. 5/5. i would highly recommend to myself lol.
customer_reviews.author: Joe snuffy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Spread Evenly
customer_reviews.text: Overall disappointed with this product. The ingredients of this product make it hard to spread evenly between the palm of your hands. I had to use a lot of efforts just to try to spread them evenly, and even then, it still has chunks all over your hands. When apply on dry hair, it does not apply evenly. And when utilize a little water to help it spread a little easier, it does not work and make it worst. The only good thing about this product is the smell. That’s it. Will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works wonders and holds all day. The scent is pleasant and doesn't linger. A little goes a really long way so the price is easily justified. I'm a guy with short hair and use this every single day. One bottle lasts me approximately 6 months. I am a fan for life.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: I have never came across such a good hair gel over the past 31 years of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This stuff is imprasive. I have never came across such a good hair gel over the past 31 years of my life. It made styling my hair much more easier and give it a Realy thick look, it also lasts all day and smelles very good. I put another 2 in my cart for the next order.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph duwaik

customer_reviews.title: Hard and not easy to work into Hair
customer_reviews.text: Stuff is hard and not easy at all to work into hair. Threw this garbage in the trash. DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WLM

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy. Light smell. I have very thick ...
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy. Light smell. I have very thick hair and this stuff works well...and its all natural ingredients. Repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: boxman

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My man loves this! Prefers this over brand name products. Hair looks and feels healthier, non greasy and smells fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: midnighttoker9294

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, it is a little tough to break it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, it is a little tough to break it down to spread into palms and then hair. However, it is a natural so that is really the least of my concerns. It is much better than the gunk I have been putting in my hair for years.
customer_reviews.author: Myself
